translations: 被动性；被动结构；无抵抗

sentences.sentence: He calls it captainitis because, he says, "crew members of multi-pilot aircraft exhibit a sometimes deadly passivity when the flight captain makes a clearly wrong-headed decision".
sentences.translation: 他称其为“机长综合症”，他说是因为“当机长做出一个明显错误的决定时，有多个飞行员的飞机上的机组人员有时会表现出致命的被动性”。

sentences.sentence: That passivity is almost certainly temporary.
sentences.translation: 但是几乎可以确定它的这种安静是暂时的。

sentences.sentence: Yet a destructive passivity has overtaken our discourse.
sentences.translation: 然而，一种破坏性的被动占据了我们的话语。
